title: Index fingers: <key>R</key> and <key>U</key>
exercise:
rrr uuu rrr uuu rrr uuu rr uu rru rru rru uru rur
uuu rrr uuu rrr uuu rrr uu rr uur uur uur rur uru

title: Middle fingers: <key>E</key> and <key>I</key>
exercise:
eee iii eee iii eee iii ee ii eei iie eei iei eie
iii eee iii eee iii eee ii ee iie eei iie eie iei
helpText:
This one is a little tricky! You will now be typing the E and I keys using your middle fingers.

Practice reaching your middle fingers from the D and K keys to the E and I keys, and bringing them back to their Home Row positions.

title: Ring fingers: <key>W</key> and <key>O</key>
exercise:
www ooo www ooo www ooo ww oo wwo oow wwo owo wow
ooo www ooo www ooo www oo ww oow wwo oow wow owo
helpText:
Moving on to your ring finger we will now be typing the W and O keys.

Remember - make sure the rest of your fingers remain on the Home Row at all times.

title: Pinkie fingers: <key>Q</key> and <key>P</key>
exercise:
qqq ppp qqq ppp qqq ppp qq pp qqp qqp ppq qpq pqp
ppp qqq ppp qqq ppp qqq pp qq ppq qqp qqp pqp qpq
helpText: You will now be typing the furthest keys on your keyboard, the Q and the P keys, using your pinkies. This may be a bit of a stretch, but practice makes perfect!

title: Index fingers: <key>T</key> and <key>Y</key>
exercise:
ttt yyy ttt yyy ttt yyy tt yy tty yyt tty yty tyt
yyy ttt yyy ttt yyy ttt yy tt yyt tty yyt tyt yty
helpText: Returning to the center of the keyboard, you will now type the T and Y keys. These are both typed with your index fingers, and may require a little stretch.

title: Back and forth we go!
exercise:
rrr uuu eee iii www ooo qqq ppp ttt yyy rr uu ei
ru ei wo qp ty ru ru ei wo qp ty ru ei wo qp ty
ruei eiwo woqp qpwo woei eiru tyyt pqow ieur ytt
ttyy rruu eeii wwoo qqpp pq ow ie ur ty qpwoeiru
helpText: Now that you've been introduced to all the Top Row keys, we will mix them up and practice them all together. Make sure that after you type each key you are bringing your fingers back to the Home Row.

title: There's a pattern to the madness
exercise:
qwert poiuy qwert poiuy weqter oiuypi qwewe oiyio
wqre uioi qtwre pyuoi qetwr yipuo teqrw ypiuo
